short_summary: Request for Proposal for TOP SECRET - ENGINEERING AND INFRASTRUCTURE SECURITY
description: This requirement is open only to those TBIPS EN578-170432 Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories: C.3 Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst, C.6 IT Security Engineer, C.7a IT Security Design Specialist CDS (Cross Domain Solution), C.7b IT Security Design Specialist, C.8 Network Security Analyst. SPC intends to award one (1) contract for a period of two (2) years. Security Requirement: Minimum Corporate Security Required: FSC – Top Secret with Access to Control Goods and Foreign Ownership, Control or Influence (FOCI).
